name: Clustered Shots
text: You take a moment to carefully aim your shots, causing them all to strike nearly the same spot.
prerequisites: Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, base attack bonus +6.
benefit: When you use a full-attack action to make multiple ranged weapon attacks against the same opponent, total the damage from all hits before applying that opponent’s damage reduction.
special: If the massive damage optional rule is being used (Core Rulebook 189), that rule applies if the total damage you deal with this feat is equal to or exceeds half the opponent’s full normal hit points (minimum 50 points of damage).
staminaText: When using this feat, you can spend up to 2 stamina points for each attack that hit the same target. Increase the damage pooled by this feat by an amount equal to the number of stamina points you spent.
text_zh: 你花费少许时间进行瞄准，然后你的攻击几乎全部命中了同一个点。
benefit_zh: 当你使用多次远程武器对同一个目标进行全力攻击，在计算目标的伤害时只用总伤害减去一次伤害减免。
special_zh: 如果启用了巨创可选规则，在使用本专长造成目标正常情况下的总生命值一半以上的伤害时（最低50点），可以适用巨创规则。
staminaText_zh: 使用该专长时每次成功的命中最多可花费2点耐力，在结算伤害时获得等同所花费耐力的伤害加值。
